009package imagingbook.common.mser;
010
011import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.EigenDecomposition;
012import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.MatrixUtils;
013import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix;
014
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016import imagingbook.common.filter.linear.GaussianFilter;
017import imagingbook.common.geometry.ellipse.GeometricEllipse;
018import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.linear.AffineMapping2D;
019import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.linear.Translation2D;
020import imagingbook.common.image.ImageMapper;
021import imagingbook.common.interpolation.InterpolationMethod;
022import imagingbook.common.math.Matrix;
023import imagingbook.common.mser.components.Component;
024
025
026/**
027 * Assumes that the given image has white background (255) and black (0) objects.
028 * TODO: check the above!
029 *
030 */
031public class LocalAffineFrameExtractor {
032        
033        static InterpolationMethod interpolMethod = InterpolationMethod.Bilinear;
034        
035        private final ImageProcessor sourceIp;
036        private final int m;            // size of frame to extract (W = H = 2 m + 1)
037        private final double s;         // size ratio between outer and inner ellipse
038        
039        public boolean useAntiAliasingFilter = true;
040        
041        public LocalAffineFrameExtractor(ImageProcessor sourceIp, int m, double s) {
042                this.sourceIp = sourceIp;
043                this.m = m;
044                this.s = s;
045        }
046        
047        public ImageProcessor getLocalAffineFrame(Component<MserData> mser) {
048                MserData props = mser.getProperties();
049                double[] xc = props.getCenter().toDoubleArray(); //{mu10, mu01};
050                double[][] S = props.getCovarianceMatrix();
051                
052                EigenDecomposition ed = new EigenDecomposition(MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(S));
053                RealMatrix V = ed.getV();
054                RealMatrix D = ed.getD();
055                
056                for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
057                        D.setEntry(i, i, Math.sqrt(D.getEntry(i, i)));
058                }
059                
060                RealMatrix A = V.multiply(D).scalarMultiply(2.0 * s / m);
061                double detA = Matrix.determinant2x2(A.getData());
062
063                if (detA < 0) { // reflection
064                        RealMatrix reflect = MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(new double[][] {{1,0},{0,-1}});
065                        A = A.multiply(reflect);        // undo reflection!!
066                }
067                
068                ImageProcessor ip2 = sourceIp.duplicate();
069                ip2.invert(); // makes the background black, objects white
070                
071                if (useAntiAliasingFilter) {
072                        GeometricEllipse ellipse = props.getEllipse();
073                        double dMax = s * ellipse.ra / m;       // scale ratio
074                        double sigma = 0;
075                        if (dMax > 1.5) {       // down-scaling, sample width increases by factor dScale
076                                sigma = (dMax - 1) * 0.5;       // factor 0.5 is ad hoc (full dMax blurs too much)
077                        }
078                        if (sigma > 0) {
079                                GaussianFilter gf = new GaussianFilter(sigma);
080                                gf.applyTo(ip2);
081                        }
082                }
083                
084                int frameSize = 2 * m + 1;
085                ImageProcessor laf = sourceIp.createProcessor(frameSize, frameSize);
086                
087                AffineMapping2D T1 = new Translation2D(-m, -m);
088                AffineMapping2D AA = new AffineMapping2D(A.getData());
089                AffineMapping2D T2 = new Translation2D(xc);
090                
091                AffineMapping2D M = T1.concat(AA).concat(T2);
092                ImageMapper mapper = new ImageMapper(M, null, interpolMethod);
093                
094                mapper.map(ip2, laf);
095                
096                laf.invert(); // makes background white again           
097                return laf;
098        }
099
100}
